alert.note: Alert for Mono (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 2:22AM PST until February 21 at 8:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...Mono County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be dangerous for high profile vehicles along US-395. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Now is the time to secure loose outdoor items such as patio furniture, holiday decorations, and trash cans before winds increase which could blow these items away. The best thing to do is prepare ahead of time by making sure you have extra food and water on hand, flashlights with spare batteries and/or candles in the event of a power outage.
